settings.tooltipContent: Select this upgrade to add Insulated Cup-Holders, an extra pocket to stash your phone, and an additional Zippered Pouch for even more storage space!

Returns: Pre-order today to lock in savings before price increases. Cancel anytime.

Shipping: Please note the Vista is currently on pre-order. Shipping is set for Summer 2023. Pre-order today to lock in huge savings. As we get closer to the ship date, pricing will increase to the full price.

The Vista™ was specially designed to fit our Hammock Chairs. The ultimate in solo hammocking. Made of our Performance Yarn which is a solution-dyed acrylic that is weatherproof, UV-safe, and will not fade. These lightweight hammocks can be used like a chair or be stretched out up to 7 feet for full-body rest!
Select this bundle to add a Hammock Chair to your Vista™ order and save $100!

settings.heading: THE VISTA™ Hammock Frame
settings.body: To create the lightest hammock stand in the world, we sourced a jet-grade aluminum (yup, the same stuff they build airplanes with!). It supports 330 lbs... but weighs just 12 lbs!

settings.heading: Custom Backpack for THE VISTA™
settings.body: Includes a custom-made backpack with cushioned back padding for a comfortable carry. Made with the highest quality materials: water-resistant TPU Cordura fabric, YKK zippers, fitted handles and straps.

settings.heading: Weightless-Weave™ Hammock Chair (sold separately)
settings.body:
Handwoven using 2.5 miles (yes, miles!) of the softest yarn ever used in hammock production, with 150,000 ultra-soft loops to cradle you weightlessly. Hang outside, rain or shine. Woven with our Signature Performance Yarn.

Hammock Chair Includes:

  • "Hammocking 101" Official Guidebook
  • Hammock Tote (for Travel + Storage)

settings.heading: Jet-Grade Aluminum Frame
settings.body: The same aluminum used in airplanes (weighs just 12 lbs but can support up to 330 lbs!).

settings.heading: Durable Powdercoat
settings.body: The Vista frame is finished with a powdercoat that is highly durable, weather-resistant and provides years of high-traffic use.

settings.heading: TPU Protective Fabric
settings.body: Vista backpack made with the highest quality materials: water-resistant TPU Cordura fabric, YKK zippers, fitted handles and straps.

settings.heading: Weather- & UV- Resistant Performance Yarn (hammock sold separately)
settings.body: Hang outside, rain or shine. Woven with our Signature Performance Yarn.

We made THE VISTA™ super simple to put together (and take apart). Everything clicks right into place, with no tools required and no small parts to lose.

You can be relaxing anywhere you choose in under a minute (it took our testers just 30 seconds).

When you’re done, it quickly packs up in the included backpack.

settings.heading: 30-Seconds to Relaxation
settings.body: Assembling The Vista™ takes under a minute. The plug and play components slide together easily and lock into place with a satisfying click. There are no tools required and no small parts to lose.

settings.heading: Ultimate Durability
settings.body: Transform your home with space to spare. A streamlined 46” diameter lets you fit a whole lot of relaxation into just a liiiittle bit of floor space. It’s a statement piece that doesn’t hog the whole room.

settings.heading: Full Body Comfort
settings.body: Your whole body will say “Ahhhh…” Converts from a chair to a full-body hammock so you can float weightlessly from head to toe. Each hammock chair can extend out 7+ feet.

settings.heading: Easy to Carry
settings.body: This is the game-changer that makes it possible for you to relax anywhere! Portable, on-demand relaxation. Bring it along on your next adventure (or just chill out in the backyard).

settings.header: The future of portable, on-demand relaxation
settings.subheader: We packed The Vista™ full of awesome features we know you’ll love…

settings.title: The lightest, most portable hammock stand in the world
settings.subtitle: Thoughtfully engineered for your comfort, convenience, and relaxation.
settings.paragraphOne: With The Vista™, well-built doesn’t mean weighty. Bulky, old-fashioned hammock stands are made from heavy steel, but we used superlight aircraft-grade aluminum to make The Vista™ the lightest free-standing hammock on the market (weighs just 12 lbs).
settings.paragraphTwo: Everything fits neatly into the included backpack, which has adjustable straps and padded back for comfortable carrying. And when it’s time to go, everything packs up in under a minute!

settings.title: Totally weightless comfort
settings.subtitle: Each handwoven hammock chair is painstakingly engineered to eliminate pressure points, so you can experience the sensation of weightless floating.
settings.paragraphOne: Our legendary handwoven hammock chairs are engineered to perfectly distribute your weight so there’s absolutely no pressure anywhere on your body. Floating weightlessly, you’ll feel your muscles relax; the swaying is also scientifically proven to rock you more quickly to sleeeeep…
settings.paragraphTwo: With The Vista™ you can sit (like a chair) or kick back for a full-body float (like a hammock!). Either way, you’ll be cradled in comfort from head to toe. (Extends to accommodate people up to 7 ft tall!)

settings.title: Perfectly engineered stability
settings.subtitle: Strong and sturdy so you always feel secure
settings.paragraphOne: We calculated the perfect pre-load tension for the cross-supports to eliminate wobbling and ensure total stability while you sway. The four elongated feet also help distribute the load and stop The Vista from sinking into soft ground.
settings.paragraphTwo: We tempered the aluminum tubing through an additional heat treatment process to add strength and flexibility, and ensure The Vista won’t ever get bent out of shape. The end result? An astoundingly light 12 lb frame that’s a breeze to bring along for camping, park picnics, soccer sidelines and beach days.

settings.title: Packed with optional upgrades…
settings.paragraphOne: The optional (add-on) insulated cup holders ensure you always have a perfectly chilled beverage within reach… And on the other side of the cup holder there's an extra phone pocket so you can stow your phone for screen-free relaxation!
settings.paragraphTwo: You can also add-on our handy zippered pouch to the base to safely store your necessities.

settings.header: Real Life Reviews of The Vista

settings.question: The Vista™ is on Pre-Order; when does it ship?
settings.answer:
The Vista™ is currently on pre-order but is expected to ship by summer 2023. By pre-ordering now, you will be securing a massive 50% discount!

Please note that due to the size of the box that the Vista and hammock will be arriving in, FREE SHIPPING is not available on this item.

settings.question: Does The Vista™ come with a hammock included?
settings.answer: The Vista™ only includes the stand itself and does not include a hammock; however, you can bundle it with your Vista™ stand by selecting 'The Vista™ + Hammock Chair Bundle' option and save $100!

settings.question: How much does The Vista™ weigh, and what is it made of?
settings.answer: The Vista™ was designed to be ultra-portable - so it only weighs 12 lbs. We managed to maintain this weight by using only superlight aircraft-grade aluminum to make The Vista™ the lightest free-standing hammock on the market.

settings.question: Does the Vista™ come with the carrying bag included?
settings.answer: Yes, it does! Every Vista™ comes with a travel backpack. Everything fits neatly into the included backpack, which has adjustable straps and a padded back for comfortable carrying. And when it’s time to go, everything packs up in under a minute!

settings.question: What accessories are available for The Vista™?
settings.answer: Additional accessories can be purchased for your Vista™ by selecting the 'Vista™ Accessories Bundle'! This bundle includes Insulated Cup-Holders, an extra phone pocket, and an additional Zippered Pouch for safely storing more items.

settings.question: I'm over 6 feet tall, will I fit in The Vista™?
settings.answer: The Hammock Chairs that are compatible with The Vista can be sat in (like a chair) or kicked back for a full-body float (like a hammock!). Either way, you’ll be cradled in comfort from head to toe. (It extends to accommodate people up to 7 ft tall!)

settings.heading: Get help from the pros
settings.body: Our Hammock Concierge team is available to answer all your questions and help you customize your throne. Reach out to get  1-on-1 advice from a hammock expert .... so you can rest easy.

settings.subheader: When you kick back in a Yellow Leaf Hammock, you’re not just enjoying a cozy snooze... You’re helping to create artisan jobs and empowering moms in rural Thailand to lift their families out of poverty. For over a decade, Yellow Leaf customers have helped to transform lives in these communities.
